code: import{useState}from'react';import styles from'./QuickOrderForm.module.scss';import iconSendBlack from'../../../assets/icons/icon_send_black.png';import iconSendWhite from'../../../assets/icons/icon_send_white.png';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export const QuickOrderForm=_ref=>{let{onSuccess}=_ref;const[phone,setPhone]=useState('');const[loading,setLoading]=useState(false);const[error,setError]=useState(null);const[isHovered,setIsHovered]=useState(false);const handleSubmit=async e=>{e.preventDefault();if(!phone.trim()||!phone.trim().length){setError('Enter your phone');return;}setError(null);setLoading(true);try{const res=await fetch("/api/order/quick-order",{method:'POST',headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'},body:JSON.stringify({phone})});if(!res.ok)throw new Error('Failed to save quick order');setLoading(false);setPhone('');if(onSuccess)onSuccess();alert('Successfully added quick order');}catch(err){console.log(err);setError(err);setLoading(false);}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{className:styles.formTel,onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{className:styles.inputTel,pattern:"^\\+?[0-9]{10, 15}$",onChange:e=>setPhone(e.target.value),value:phone,type:"text",placeholder:"Phone"}),error&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:error.message||error}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{onMouseEnter:()=>setIsHovered(true),onMouseLeave:()=>setIsHovered(false),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:styles.btnTel,type:"submit",children:loading?'Loading...':isHovered?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:iconSendBlack,alt:"Quick Order"}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:iconSendWhite,alt:"Quick Order"})})})]});};
